app.title: Grocery List
app.metaDescription: Log in to manage your personal grocery lists. Free and easy to use.

auth.name: Name
auth.verifyMailMessageBody: A verification email has been sent. Please check your inbox.
auth.emailVerifiedBody: Your email has been verified. You can now log in to your account.
auth.emailVerifyFailedBody: There was a problem verifying your email. Please try again or contact support.
auth.passwordUpdatedBody: Your password has been updated. You can now log in.
auth.checkEmailBody: If an account exists for the provided email address, we've sent you a link to reset your password. Check your inbox—and don't forget to check your spam or junk folder just in case.

lists.title: Your grocery lists
lists.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this list?
lists.sharePrompt: Enter an email address to share the list with:

cards.title: Title
cards.confirmDelete: Do you want to delete this card?
cards.noCards: You have not added any cards yet.
